8) Don't rule out @tesla acquisition (ala @nest) and keep the top man aka @elonmusk in charge. This would be massive. $GOOG $TSLA
7) The holding company can make some major acquisitions like @pandora @spotify @twitter without the regulatory/Wall Street scrutiny.
6) Sundar Pichai is managing the company's money spigot & that is a good thing for investors & employees. #GOOG
